CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. 1 reads: Death Bicycle - This is the broken and twisted bicycle which James Knox Jr., 9, 7447 Monticello St., inset, was riding when he was hit and killed by an automobile Monday evening at Idlewild and Collier Sts. The car was driven by Mrs. Lois Fitzmaurice, 26, of 231 Garlow Dr., Penn Township. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dark Firestone Deluxe Cruiser bicycle with dented fenders, torn seat, and bent book rack, owned by James Knox Jr.
